original_text: For you have need of endurance, so that when you have done the will of God you may receive what is promised.
korean_text: 너희에게 인내가 필요함은 너희가 하나님의 뜻을 행한 후에 약속하신 것을 받기 위함이라

sentences.original_text: For you have need of endurance,
so that when you have done the will of God
you may receive what is promised.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 약속된 것을 받게 될 것입니다.
